1001.text: She's not very good at playing poker; her tail calls her bluff.

1002.text: She puts care into it to reduce air resistance.

1003.text: Waves around excitedly when she gets attention.

1004.text: She likes to shampoo her hair in the morning to make it smooth and silky.

1005.text: It sways gracefully, like a feather in an opera.

1006.text: She has a soft body, so every part of it must be maintained.

1007.text: She sometimes leaves it in her room (according to her).

1008.text: She practices shaking it to look cool.

1009.text: She struggles to brush it every morning.

1010.text: She has her tail spray mailed to her.

1011.text: Able to swat bugs without looking behind her.

1012.text: Many students admire her shiny black hair.

1013.text: Sways wildly when she's talking about sports.

1014.text: Grabbing her tail is an automatic foul.

1016.text: She rarely takes care of her tail.

1017.text: When she's giving a speech, every strand of hair is powerful.

1018.text: She uses the same tail oil as her mother.

1019.text: She goes to the hairdresser to get her hair done before a live.

1020.text: Naturally well-done without tending to it.

1021.text: Shakes like a lightning bolt when she's angry.

1022.text: She has the unique hair texture of royalty. Commonly known as a "Royal Tail".

1023.text: When it's damp, she has a hard time getting her tail into the tail hole of her clothes.

1024.text: It swishes around a lot when she lies.

1025.text: She has naturally soft and silky hair.

1026.text: Rumor has it that she has enough strength to stand on her own tail...

1027.text: She sweats a lot, so she always has a towel for her tail.

1028.text: It swishes around a lot while she's whisking.

1029.text: Currently trying out low-price care products.

1030.text: She pays attention not to bump it into people.

1031.text: Used to being played with by her sisters, she's never surprised when it gets grabbed.

1032.text: When she gets an idea, her tail stands on end.

1033.text: She has a habit of unconsciously clutching it while sleeping.

1034.text: Washing it with hot water even in the middle of summer is a chic obsession.

1035.text: Expressions of joy, anger, grief, and pleasure are always visible.

1036.text: She calculates and maintains the appropriate length and hair volume for efficient running.

1037.text: She cuts it to the nearest tenth of a millimeter.

1038.text: Fluffy and silky to the touch, it'll make you fall in love with it.

1040.text: Unconsciously stays still when being photographed.

1041.text: When she's rushing, you can't even catch the tips of her tail.

1042.text: Learned calligraphy with her tail to perform internationally.

1043.text: Often has drool on it when she wakes up.

1044.text: The black cat she tried to tame is treating it like a toy.

1045.text: It's great at soothing small children.

1046.text: She pays attention to how she sits so that she doesn't get in the habit of sitting improperly.

1047.text: In crowds, she gets nervous and doesn't move it an inch.

1048.text: She always makes sure to check for split ends.

1049.text: Uses her tail movements as a bluff when gambling.

1050.text: Flicks when touched by anyone other than a trusted friend.

1051.text: It smells like the sun and the scent of flowers in each season.

1052.text: She thought spinning it would make her go faster.

1053.text: She disciplines her tail every day too.

1054.text: She accidentally steps on it when posing like a hero.

1055.text: When she finds something marvelous, it goes up like an antenna☆

1056.text: Will suddenly stop moving during a fortune-telling session.

1058.text: She has a habit of fiddling with it when distressed, so it gets tangled up a lot.

1059.text: She prefers products that suit her hair type rather than brand name products.

1060.text: She takes care of it in the middle of the night in secret.

1061.text: Her tail wagging is always top-notch.

1062.text: When she cuts it herself, it looks like diagonally cut bangs.

1063.text: She uses it to point at things.

1064.text: It sometimes tickles other people's legs to make them laugh.

1065.text: Loves making heart shapes with her friends for photos.

1066.text: Wags all over the place, never staying still.

1068.text: Even her tail can hold heavy things.

1069.text: Tended to with the same oil that Maruzensky uses.

1070.text: Tends to get all frizzy when she's frustrated.

1071.text: She loves to use a custom-made organic treatment.

1072.text: It's strong enough to knock down flying objects.

1074.text: She doesn't really notice it when it lays on her hips.

1076.text: The hair is very fluffy, just like her mom's.

1077.text: She's worried about it getting frizzy in humidity.

1080.text: She tests the latest tail care products on herself.

1082.text: She has plenty of hair styles for her tail.

1084.text: "I destroy common sense—" (She wants to break a fence with her tail.)

1085.text: The hairtips naturally curl themselves into classy shapes.

1087.text: Looking for a style that will look good in merch

1088.text: Treated with products from the Satono Group hotel chain.

1089.text: Vivlos often braids it without permission.

1091.text: She uses conditioner from a brand for celebrities.

1094.text: It flaps like crazy when she's near Fuji Kiseki.

1098.text: It tends to flutter towards the luckiest direction of the day.

1099.text: More active when in Locadol mode.

1100.text: Elegantly slips away from any touching attempts

1102.text: She uses different tail cologne when she's in uniform.

1104.text: She welcomes brushing at any time.

1105.text: Becomes a Dust Tail when she's not feeling well.

1106.text: She's thought about dyeing it before.

1107.text: Uses hair oil to make it stand out while dancing.

1108.text: She got it to the perfect weight for exercise.

1110.text: She uses deep-sea water shampoo for it.

1116.text: She wears a needle lace tail cover for bedtime.

1120.text: Cuts her hair perfectly straight using a ruler.

1121.text: She wonders if she couldn't use it as a weapon.
